column5: For any of you older types who might want to relive a little innocence WNED is running a Pete Paul and Mary special as I type.
Puff the magic dragon in all their glory....RIP Mary....
those scenes a the memorial bring back some memories.
My wife caught that show a couple of weeks ago and loved it. I don't think she knew much about them at the time but now has spent some good coin at itunes.  Cheers
That whole folk music culture had a big influence as I grew up. When Mary Travers died of cancer I thought I had lost a dear friend.
I did see some of the special, so many memories. If I recall there was some issues about Puff the Magic Dragon being a song about toking. Kind-a fits if you thing of it!

I've seen that show a couple times now, always enjoyed PP&M  I  saw a similar show about John Denver a couple weeks back and evidently he was friends with PP&M and used to do some shows with them.  Lotsa good music from that era.
